example.code:
PS C:\> Get-EC2ConsoleOutput -InstanceId i-0e19abcd47c123456
InstanceId Output ---------- ------ i-0e194d3c47c123637 WyAgICAwLjAwMDAwMF0gQ29tbW...bGU9dHR5UzAgc2Vs
example.description: This example gets the console output for the specified Linux instance. The console output is encoded.
This example stores the encoded console output in a variable and then decodes it.
